subscription_page_subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and access exclusive content and powerful tools.
subscription_already_subscribed_desc: Thank you for being part of ORVAFX. Enjoy all the benefits of your {tier} plan.
subscription_already_subscribed_contact: If you wish to change your plan or have any questions, please contact support.
subscription_modal_desc: To complete your {price} subscription, please make the payment to the following USDT TRC20 wallet.
subscription_wallet_address_copied_desc: Wallet address has been copied to clipboard.
subscription_wallet_important_note: Important: Send only USDT on the TRC20 network. Sending other tokens or using another network may result in loss of funds.
subscription_tx_hash_note: After making the payment, copy and paste the transaction hash here so we can verify it.
subscription_payment_sent_toast_desc: Your payment has been sent and is pending approval by an administrator. You will receive a notification once processed.
subscription_payment_info_desc1: All payments are made via cryptocurrency transfer to our USDT (TRC20) wallet.
subscription_payment_info_desc2: Once the payment is made, you must enter the Transaction Hash (TX ID) so our administrative team can verify and approve your subscription. This process may take a few hours.
subscription_payment_info_warning: Make sure to send the exact amount and use the TRC20 network. ORVAFX is not responsible for transaction errors.
